partnerDetails.about:
Pavlos Mavridis & Sia OE (Wicken Technologies) is a process control and automation system integrator headquartered in Lakoma Chalkidiki-Greece, with a wide range of experience in software engineering for industrial applications.  

We deliver worldwide PLC, HMI and SCADA solutions to all major industries using modern software engineering methods or retrofit existing obsolete automation systems to today’s requirements with enhanced reliability.

Our programs are reliable, efficient and can be written in any language, defined under IEC 61131-3 standard, for all main PLC manufacturers.

The SCADA and HMI solutions are tailored to meet specific operational needs and utilizing the latest industry standards and technologies.

Our projects can be partial or turn-key. We often cooperate with other system integrators and machinery developers providing our services in the automation field. Our services can include:

  • Hardware configuration
  • Commissioning
  • Function plans
  • Remote maintaining

Industries engaged until today:

  • Mining: Long distance Transportation systems, Excavator, Stacking System
  • Port: Ship loader
  • Automotive industry: Production control systems, Automated car parking system APS
  • Feed industry: Complete production lines: Animal feed, Fish feed, Pet Food
  • Energy: Solar tracker, Weather station

Our latest software R&D is focused on:

  • Web page reporting
  • Data collection in quality management          
  • Quality control
  • Retrofit of old Micro, Premium, Quantum and Momentum PLC’s

We are a member of the Schneider Electric Automation Club.
